mapper.insert: insert into member(M_ID, M_PW, M_NAME, M_PHONE, M_BIRTH, M_EMAIL) values(#{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_birth}, #{m_email})
mapper.select: select M_ID, M_NAME, M_PHONE, M_BIRTH, M_EMAIL from member where M_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: update member set M_NAME = #{m_name}, M_PHONE = #{m_phone}, M_BIRTH = #{m_birth}, M_EMAIL = #{m_email} where M_ID = #{m_id}
mapper.delete: delete from member where M_ID = #{m_id} and M_PW = #{m_pw}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where M_ID = #{id}
